required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase I Study of TAS-102 in Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, OPEN-Label, Non-randomized, Pharmacokinetic Study of TAS-102 in Chinese Patients With Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the pharmacokinetics of TAS-102 after single and multiple dose in Chinese patients with solid tumor.

detailed_description.textblock: This is an open-label, non-randomized, single group Phase 1 study of TAS-102, evaluating the pharmacokinetics, safety, and antitumor activity. Blood sampling will be performed during the first cycle (Day1 and Day 12) of therapy in all consenting patients.

primary_outcome.measure: Cmax (maximum plasma concentration) of FTD and TPI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple time points on Day 1 and Day 12 of Cycle 1.

primary_outcome.measure: Tmax (time to reach maximum drug concentration in blood) of FTD and TPI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple time points on Day 1 and Day 12 of Cycle 1.

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-t (area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time 0 to time (t) of the last quantifiable concentration ) of FTD and TPI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple time points on Day 1 and Day 12 of Cycle 1.

primary_outcome.measure: AUC0-10 (area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time 0 to 10 hours post dose) of FTD and TPI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple time points on Day 1 and Day 12 of Cycle 1.

primary_outcome.measure: AUCinf (area under the plasma concentration versus time curve from time 0 to infinity) of FTD and TPI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple time points on Day 1 and Day 12 of Cycle 1.
Multiple time points on Day 1 and Day 12 of Cycle 1.

primary_outcome.measure: CL/F (oral clearance) of FTD and TPI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple time points on Day 1 and Day 12 of Cycle 1.

primary_outcome.measure: Vd/F (apparent volume of distribution) of FTD and TPI
primary_outcome.time_frame: Multiple time points on Day 1 and Day 12 of Cycle 1.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events as a measure of safety
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through 30 days following last administration of study medication.

intervention.description: TAS-102 (35 mg/m2/dose) orally, twice daily on days 1-5 and 8-12 of each 28-day cycle. Number of cycles: until at least one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 1. Has provided written informed consent prior to performance of any study procedure.
- 2. Has definitive histologically or cytologically confirmed advanced or metastatic solid tumor.
- 3. Is able to take medications orally.
- 4. Has adequate organ function (bone marrow, kidney and liver).
- 5. Has Eastern Cooperative Group (ECOG) performance status of 0 or 1.
Exclusion Criteria:
- 1. Has received TAS-102.
- 2. Has suffered serious complications.
- 3. Has unresolved toxicity of greater than or equal to CTCAE Grade 2 attributed to any prior therapies.
- 4. Has had prior gastrectomy.
- 5. Is a pregnant or lactating female or male who refused using birth control during the clinical trial period and within 6 months after discontinuation of study treatment.

facility.name: Taiho Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd selected site
